overview: On a sun-kissed beach, six people linger lazily, each confident of fulfilling his or her desires before the day is out.  A wealthy heiress, Emmanuelle, has designs on a handsome adolescent, Ivan, but his interests lie elsewhere.  Having gratified Emmanuelle’s womanly needs, Ivan immediately sets out to make his next conquest, the mistress of a well-known writer...
title: And Satan Calls the Turns
